dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') incident_date, it.item_xid || ' - ' || it.description product, 'SCOULAR - ' || con.first_name || ' ' || con.last_name contact_name, 'SHIP ID ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(TRIM(LEADING 0 FROM TO_NUMBER(sh.shipment_xid)))) lot_number, TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'fmMM/DD/YYYY') shipment_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(sh.total_weight_base / 2000,'999999990')) || ' TON OF ' || (CASE WHEN TRIM(oref1.ob_refnum_value) = 'BULK' THEN oref1.ob_refnum_value ELSE TRIM(oref2.ob_refnum_value) || ' ' || TRIM(oref3.ob_refnum_value) || ' ' || TRIM(oref4.ob_refnum_value) END) quantity, srem1.remark_text incident, srem2.remark_text research, srem3.remark_text resolution, con.first_name || ' ' || con.last_name person, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') run_date FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON sh.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON orel.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PACKAGING_DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref2 ON orel.order_base_gid = oref2.order_base_gid AND oref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PACKAGING NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref3 ON orel.order_base_gid = oref3.order_base_gid AND oref3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PACKAGING UNIT OF MEASURE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref4 ON orel.order_base_gid = oref4.order_base_gid AND oref4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LTL PACKAGING DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON sh.insert_user = con.gl_user_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON sh.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.INCIDENT_PROBLEM_DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem2 ON sh.shipment_gid = srem2.shipment_gid AND srem2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.INCIDENT_PROBLEM_RESEARCH' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem3 ON sh.shipment_gid = srem3.shipment_gid AND srem3.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.INCIDENT_PROBLEM_RESOLUTION' WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID
